**__How did this all get started?__

:thinking: :thinking:
It was started by __3 Indian Friends__ !!!
They made a small group which consists of 5 people and was called __IPT__.
Our main motive is to connect Indian People who love __Pokémon__. :kissing_smiling_eyes:**
:bookmark:  It was founded on 26th January 2017.
